channel.title: Comments on: iPad mini Review – Initial Thoughts and Impressions

item.title: By: charlesmckeever
item.dc:creator: charlesmckeever
item.description: I've been using my iPad mini as my primary tablet and I have to say I haven't missed the larger screen on the iPad 2. I have ordered a folio case with a built in keyboard and I plan to test out using it more as my content creation device when I'm on the road and even when I'm in the office. Does anyone else use their iPad to create things on a regular basis? It's kind of an on-going debate around here.
